content: I’m generally not a hip hop listener, but enjoyed this article. NPR effectively wrote the same article a few weeks ago on Bob Seger: Where Have All The Bob Seger Albums Gone?There was no such thing as Classic Rock in 1976 - the phrase, and the radio format it inspired, wouldn't come into…www.npr.org Seger has the double whammy of not having his back catalog available on digital music services AND much of his earlier work is out of print in physical format, too.
